name: The Sonic Heroes
description:
[PT/BR]Agora nosso incrivel ouriço se junta com seus amigos contra outras equipes para pegar as esmeraldas do caos ," quando ainda tinha o CD eu sempre jogava com a equipe shadow ou a chaotix :D".
[EN/BR]Now our amazing hedgehog is teaming up with his friends against other teams to get the chaos emeralds,"when I still had the CD I always played with the team shadow or team chaotix :D".
